abstract: 'Very determined to go his own way.'
description: Noel Withers is very proud of his son Matt. Born with Crouzon Syndrome, Matt suffered hearing loss, facial abnomalities and had to undergo numerous procedures to accommodate brain growth. Some operations were more successful than others, but Matt faced them all with a determination that inspired admiration in those around him.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002285; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (September 2008); Active; 2008
